name: A Blink Of Light
description:
A Jabjob (non-violent FPS based on throwing objects) made for the US335U (Unity's introduction) at the CNAM ENJMIN. (C#, Unity3D)

Made with URP (Universal Render Pipeline), it's a plateformer/horror game where you use the Blink (green ball) to attract some fireflies and therefore see what's ahead of you. However, try to not make a sound...

You can move using "WASD", control the camera with the mouse, walk quietly by holding "P", throw the Blink with the left click and teleport it in your hand with the right click.

Your goal is to throw the Blink in the red spot upstairs, without getting caught.

GitHub : EnkiBachelier/A-Blink-Of-Light (github.com)
